item.description:
IMDB page

Rotten Tomatoes / Flixster page

Wikipedia page

 

Welcome to the ongoing series  "new release night at Dan's", where ideally I will schedule the Meetup for the actual home video release date, or as close to that as possible dependent on when I am free.   It is my hope that this will be your next best (and soonest) option to seeing the movie at your local megaplex during its theatrical run.

I live in Millbury - just off routes 146, 90, and 20 - and will disclose the address and my contact info in a private email to the members who sign up. ***EARLY START TIME*** due to length of movie. Please plan on arriving about 6:30 to get settled and chat a bit, and the movie starts at 7:00 sharp.

Feel free to bring munchies and/or beverages for yourself and/or others, but please do not feel obligated to do so.  The assumption should be that people will have eaten a proper meal before they come over, and if that's not the case then by all means bring whatever.  I will make it a point to always make fresh popcorn for these movie nights, but really I expect nothing in return besides a good time had by all.  I'll have unlimited Brita-filtered water, yay!

If all 6 slots are taken up, I recommend jumping on the waiting list and marking your calendars, since we all know plans change for people and folks may back out last minute.  Hope you can make it!

group.name: The Worcester Movie Fans Meetup Group

item.name: New Release movie night at Dan's: Cloud Atlas
